meanings.def: happening, done or produced every day
examples: Many people still read a daily newspaper.
events affecting the daily lives of millions of people
The daily routine is the same for all prisoners.
Keep a record of your daily activities.
the recommended daily intake of vitamin C
Invoices are signed on a daily basis.
Keep a daily record of your progress.
There are daily flights from Dublin to Barcelona.
There was increased state interference in all spheres of daily life.
The simple things of daily living are often the biggest challenges for him.

meanings.def: the basic things that you need to live, especially food

idioms.def: the basic things that you need to live, especially food

examples: The machines are inspected twice daily.

meanings.def: a newspaper published every day except Sunday
examples: The story was in all the dailies.

meanings.def: a person employed to come to somebody’s house each day to clean it and do other jobs
